import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var initialState={category:null};var categorySlice=createSlice({name:"category",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setCategory:function setCategory(state,action){state.category=action.payload;}}});// Action generated from the slice
var setCategory=categorySlice.actions.setCategory;// Selector
export{setCategory};export var categorySelector=function categorySelector(state){return state.category;};// Reducer
